metadata.title: Cute Cat Rubber Hot Water Bottle with Plush Fleece Cover, Hand Feet Belly Warmer
features: SIZE:7.7 x 4.9 inches /19.5 x 12.4cm£¨L x W) ;CAPACITY:11.8oz / 350ml.Mini size,convenient to carry when you are going out,working,shopping,etc.
WARMING WATER BOTTLE:Made of rubber liner, safe and reliable.With faux fur cover,soft , skin-friendly and retain heat for an extra long time.

EASY TO USE:Wide mouth is easy to fill and the screw cap prevent water spitting out .?Fill only to two-thirds capacity maximum. You can also use it as a cold compress by inserting ice or filling it halfway with water and freezing.
GREAT GIFT CHOICE - The perfect Birthday or Holiday gift for friends and family, ideal for keeping you cosy at night or quick pain relief.?

GREAT FOR PAIN RELIEF, HOT & COLD THERAPY ¨C This hot water bottle can be used treating sore muscles, stress or cramps,arthritis, aches and pains, stiff necks, lower back pain, menstrual cramps and other common aches and can also double up as a cold compress for kids with fever or to reduce swelling for minor injuries.
description: Your satisfaction is our goal of service. If there is any problem with the item after you get it, please free to contact us, we will try our best to resolve all the problems for you.Specifications:1) Hot-Water Bottle Material: Rubber2) Outer Cover Material: faux fur3) Size: 7.7'' x 4.9'' (LxW)4) Weight: 0.13 LB5) Capacity: 350ml/11.8 oz6) Design: cat and claw pattern7) Package Included: 1 x Hot-water Bottle

1)It is made from natural rubber, some rubber smell is normal, just put it in a ventilated environment for few days, the smell will disappear.2)This hot water bottle is the perfect treatment for aching muscles, pains and sports injuries.3) The heat of hot water bottle can keep more than 6 hours if you use it in blanket or quilt. It always depends on the environment you use it.4£As with the faux fur cover, you may not feel very hot. If you like hot feel, please remove the cover to get more heat.

1) Fold up the bottle2) Put the bottle into the faux fur cover3) Lay them flat and completely overlapping4) Fill the bottle to only 2/3 full5) Squeeze excess air out6) Tighten the bottle stopper7) Take the bottle upside for leakage checking
